I'm a piccoloist. Over the past few years, I've performed several times in concerts which have been highly critically acclaimed by the critics as well as my colleagues and teachers within the music profession. I've made myself front-page news a few times. I've been highly acclaimed as one of the greatest piccoloist of my time. Attendance at each of my last several concerts was more than one thousand. On New Year's Eve, I returned to Japan to perform in a New Year recital which was highly critically acclaimed by the press including Japan Times Online, Japan Today, Hong Kong Economic Journal, Hong Kong Economic Times, Oriental Daily, Southern Daily, China News Service, China National Radio, South China Morning Post and Huizhou Daily. It was a publicly acclaimed concert. I made myself front-page news again. I was acclaimed for my virtuoso technique, color (also known as timbre or tone color), vast repertoire and the depth of my interpretation as well as my contribution to the cultural exchange through music between Japan and Hong Kong. Over one thousand people were in attendance at ny New Year recital. I had great attendance despite the bad weather and the pandemic of the virus whereas my friend who performed in a music festival got unusually low attendance.

I'm a French hornist. Over the last few years, I've performed several times in concerts which have been front-page news. My last several concerts were highly critically acclaimed by many newspapers and magazines as well as my colleagues and teachers in the music profession. I was highly acclaimed on the front page of Southern Daily and Hong Kong Economic Times for my tone quality (also known as tone color or timbre), virtuoso technique, vast repertoire and the depth of my interpretation of Sergei Rachmaninoff as well as my contribution to the cultural exchange through music between Hong Kong and Japan. I was publicly acclaimed as Asia's greatest French hornist of my generation. My last few concerts had attendances of over one thousand people. On New Year's Day, I returned to Japan to perform in a New Year recital which was front-page news. It was highly critically acclaimed by thr music and art critics as well as my teachers and colleagues within the music profession. I was widely acclaimed by Hong Kong Economic Journal, Southern Daily, Hong Kong Economic Times and Japan Times Online as one of the greatest French hornists of my time. I'm a foodie who loves eating steaks, Vietnamese beef ho fun (noodles), grilled wagyu beef, grilled eel rice, seventy two percent dark chocolate cakes and cheesecakes. What level of steak doneness do you prefer: Extra rare or blue, rare, medium rare, medium, medium well or well done?

Rabbits are prey animals which means they're everybody else's lunch in nature. A dog barking, a child shouting, a fire engine siren wailing, an aeroplane flying overhead and a lightning storm can frighten rabbits. Therefore, walking a rabbit on a leash isn't recommended. Indoor rabbits have a much longer lifespan than outdoor rabbits because they're protected from poor weather conditions and enemies. They feel safe, protected, monitored, sheltered and that they're part of the family! The average lifespan of an indoor house rabbit is eight to fourteen years while the average lifespan of a rabbit kept in an outdoor hutch or cage is three to six years. The happiest rabbit expression is called binky. When a rabbit binkies, it jumps into the air and twists its head and body in the opposite direction before falling back to the ground. A happy rabbit even twirls, flops, stretches its legs and shakes its head. All this is telling you that it's happy and overall pleased with you and its life. Rabbits produce two types of droppings: fecal pellets and Cecil pellets (aka cecotropes). The former are the dry, round ones you usually see in the litterbox whereas the latter are edible for rabbits which contain essential nutrients. Rabbits are one of the most abandoned pets in the world. In fact, it's the third most abandoned pets in the United States because people don't understand rabbits.They think rabbits are boring and that they don't bond with humans. Rabbits are highly intelligent, social and affectionate animals. While they don't like to be picked up from the ground, they much prefer to be petted and cuddled while they're on the ground or in your lap. When people say they want to have a pet rabbit, I usually advise them to visit the rabbit society and choose a rabbit for adoption.

Wrap up warmly. It's freezing outside. Bundle up. I'm bundled up in a Uniqlo Heattech crew neck t-shirt, a Heattech V-neck t-shirt, a red sweatshirt and a down jacket. My cousin is sat bundled up in a long-sleeved turtle neck t-shirt, a sky blue shirt, a leather coat, a scarf and a pair of gloves. Wear lots of layers in case the temperature goes down still further. The temperature has dropped fairly rapidly in the past five days. Be sure to put on some more clothes and get enough rest. Wrap up warm. Keep warm!

Some women seem to bloom in their mid-thirties. For example: Samantha Gao has bloomed into an utterly beautiful woman. Not every man's type of women are the same. Of course, everybody likes handsome and beautiful people. In terms of appearance, some men like petite women, some luke tall and thin women, some luke svelte women, some like them sporty, some like them well-rounded and curvaceous, some like them voluptuous, some like them well-rounded, curvaceous and sporty, some like them busty, some like curvy legs, some luke soft and silky feet and so forth. In terms of personality, some men likes compassionate women, some like vivacious women, some like them kind-hearted and helpful, some luke them quiet, some like them tactful and diplomatic, some like them sociable and talkative, some like to be controlled and dominated and so on. Isaac is a fan of Tracy Zhu and Samantha Gao, both of whom are exquisitely beautiful women. Like Isaac, they both have an exquisite taste in fashion, shoes, hairstyles, food, interior and exterior design. Both are glamorous ladies who always dress up in glamorous outfits. They rarely dress down. I once saw Tracy dress up in a superman costume for a party while Samantha was in a bikini. Both of them have a glamorous job and career. I regard acting as a worthwhile career. Tracy has got a leading role in the upcoming television series whereas Samantha has got a supporting role in it. Samantha plays the role of a dentist in it. By the way, I don't think Isaac needs to dress up to go to work. A polo shirt and shorts are fine. Just dress down to go to work. Isaac thinks if a woman without makeup is still pretty, then she's pretty. And there shouldn't be a huge difference between with makeup and without.

I used to have a Siberian husky who grew up with me. He died at the age of fourteen in twenty fifteen. I now have a lop bunny and three turtles; one Mexican musk turtle and two red-eared sliders. My sister has a Pekingnese.
